LanguageData.Ind_ConcreteMixer.label: concrete mixer
LanguageData.Ind_DeepMine.label: deep mine
LanguageData.Ind_DeepMine.description: You can mining several kinds of resources from deep mine, it can only be built on a mining hole. (order a plasma drilling from skydriller, it will make a mining hole at drilling spot.)
LanguageData.Ind_ElectricArcFurnace.label: electric arc furnace
LanguageData.Ind_ElectricArcFurnace.description: A electric arc furnace for steel production, efficient but very power hungry.
